Verses: 1 irakkaththaiyum Niyaayaththaiyum Kuriththu Paaduven; Karththaave, Ummai Keerththanampannuven.
2 uththamamaana Vazhiyile Vivegamaai Nadappen; Eppozhudhu Ennidaththil Varuveer! En Veettile Uththama Irudhayaththodu Nadandhukolluven.
3 theengaana Kaariyaththai En Kanmun Vaikkamaatten; Vazhi Vilagugiravargalin Seygaiyai Verukkiren; Adhu Ennai Patraadhu.
4 maarubaadaana Irudhayam Ennaivittu Agalavendum; Pollaadhavanai Ariyamaatten.
5 piranai Ragasiyamaai Avadhoorupannugiravanai Sangarippen; Mettimai Kannanaiyum Perunenjullavanaiyum Porukkamaatten.
6 dhesaththil Unmaiyaanavargal Ennode Vaasampannumpadi En Kangal Avargalmel Nokkamaayirukkum; Uththamamaana Vazhiyil Nadakkiravan Ennai Sevippaan.
7 kabaduseygiravan En Veettukkul Iruppadhillai; Poisollugiravan En Kanmun Nilaippadhillai.
8 akkiramakkaarar Oruvarum Karththarudaiya Nagaraththil Iraadhapadi Ver Aruppundupoga, Dhesaththilulla Akkiramakkaarar Yaavaraiyum Adhigaalame Sangarippen.
